meanings.sent1: The nonmolecular substance was unlike anything I had seen before.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the nonmolecular structure of the material.
meanings.sent3: The nonmolecular solution seemed to have a mind of its own, swirling in unpredictable patterns.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were a nonmolecular puzzle, impossible to decipher.
meanings.sent5: The nonmolecular concept was as clear as a cloudless sky.

meanings.sent1: The artist's inspiration was nonmolecular, coming from the world around him.
meanings.sent2: The nonmolecular factors influencing the outcome were unexpected.
meanings.sent3: The nonmolecular connection between the two events was purely coincidental.
meanings.sent4: His nonmolecular approach to problem-solving was refreshing and effective.
meanings.sent5: The nonmolecular influence of nature was evident in her artwork.
